name: Learned Tactician
description: You have studied great military treatises, and bring your expansive tactical knowledge to the dungeon.
effect: Roll a dice at the beginning of the adversary phase. On a 6, this hero and any heroes adjacent to them can immediately make a weapon action or a Move action without having to spend a hero dice.
additionalEffect: the hero can use this skill on a roll of 5 or 6 instead of only on a 6.
